Luna:DefaultOrb.NAME: Default Orb
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, draw #b
NL #yEvoke: Deal #b damage to all enemies.

Luna:SlashStance.NAME: Stance: Slash
DESCRIPTION: While this Stance is active, gain #b2 #yStrength at the cost of #r1 $yDexterity

Luna:EngardeStance.NAME: Stance: Engarde
DESCRIPTION: While this Stance is active, gain #b2 #yDexterity at the cost of #r1 #yStrength

Luna:ParryStance.NAME: Stance: Slash
DESCRIPTION: While this Stance is active, gain #b2 #yStrength at the cost of #r1 $yDexterity
damage to the enemy with the lowest hp.

Luna:PierceStance.NAME: Stance: Pierce
DESCRIPTION: While this Stance is active, gain deal 3 bonus attack damage and NL
Whenever you attack an enemy, 3 of the damage ignores block.

Luna:AceStance.NAME: Stance: Ace
DESCRIPTION: While this Stance is active, gain #b2 #yStrength and #b2 Dexterity at the cost of #pidk
